original_title: 中出し女教師の誘惑～憧れの若妻先生と秘密の校内性交～ 里美ゆりあ
overview: My longing teacher, Yuria, gets married to her homeroom teacher, who is also her teacher. She then has sex with me and the teacher many times in the school, hiding from her teacher and her classmates, in her hallway, infirmary, and staff room. Her sense of guilt makes her pleasure even stronger...
title: My Teacher’s Creampie Temptation ~Secret Sex At School With The Young Married Teacher I Love~ Yuria Satomi
